name: com.aitorsimona.traverser
description: Traverser is a player traversal toolkit featuring as of now the most basic traversal abilities which are Locomotion, Parkour and Climbing. It is self-contained in a set of scripts and has no dependencies apart from the basic Unity functionality. Use the given abilities or expand the system through its shared ability workflow.

samples.description: Contains animations, models, prefabs and a demo scene. Recommended to see how the system is used.
